name: contact
description: Select contacts by activity state, gap distance, contact model, or type. Multiple keywords can be combined.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Select only active contacts. Activity status depends on the contact model installed.

parameters.name: inactive
parameters.description: Select only inactive contacts. Activity status depends on the contact model installed.

parameters.name: gap
parameters.description: Select contacts based on gap. Single value f1: gap <= f1. Two values: f1 <= gap <= f2.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Select contacts by contact model name (e.g., linear, hertz, linearpbond).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Select contacts by type (e.g., ball-ball, ball-pebble, ball-wallfacet, ball-rblock).
